text.div:
HIV Infection (Tests for HIV Nucleic Acid [Viral Load])

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    10351-5 HIV 1 RNA [Units/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe with amplification
    20447-9 HIV 1 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    21008-8 HIV 1 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe
    23876-6 HIV 1 RNA [Units/volume] (viral load) in Plasma by Probe with signal amplification
    25836-8 HIV 1 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    29539-4 HIV 1 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Plasma by Probe with signal amplification
    29541-0 HIV 1 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    41497-9 HIV 1 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    41498-7 HIV 1 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    41513-3 HIV 1 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe with amplification detection limit = 400 copies/mL
    41514-1 HIV 1 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe with amplification detection limit = 2.6 log copies/mL
    41515-8 HIV 1 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe with amplification detection limit = 75 copies/mL
    41516-6 HIV 1 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe with amplification detection limit = 1.9 log copies/mL
    48510-2 HIV 1 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe and target amplification method detection limit = 1.7 log copies/mL
    48511-0 HIV 1 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe and target amplification method detection limit = 50 copies/mL
    48551-6 HIV 1 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe and target amplification method detection limit = 400 copies/mL
    48552-4 HIV 1 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe and target amplification method detection limit = 2.6 log copies/mL
    49890-7 HIV 1 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    51780-5 HIV 1 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe and target amplification method detection limit = 0.5 log copies/mL
    59419-2 HIV 1 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Plasma by Probe with signal amplification
    62469-2 HIV 1 RNA [Units/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    69354-9 HIV 2 RNA [Units/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    70241-5 HIV 1 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Plasma by Probe and target amplification method detection limit = 20 copies/mL
    74854-1 HIV 1 proviral DNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    74855-8 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    78007-2 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Logarithmic entitic number] (viral load) in Blood mononuclear cells by NAA with probe detection
    78008-0 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Entitic number] (viral load) in Mononuclear cells from unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    78009-8 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Entitic number] (viral load) in Blood mononuclear cells by NAA with probe detection
    78010-6 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Logarithmic entitic number] (viral load) in Mononuclear cells from unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    81652-0 HIV 2 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    86547-7 HIV 2 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    86548-5 HIV 2 RNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    86549-3 HIV 2 RNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
